headline: Borussia Dortmund to 'pull together' against Monaco after explosions damage bus
text: "Shocked" Borussia Dortmund players will "pull together" when they face Monaco, 24 hours after their team bus was damaged by explosions.

headline: Wladimir Klitschko: Anthony Joshua will be 'facing Mount Everest' for heavyweight title
text: Wladimir Klitschko warns Anthony Joshua that fighting him for the heavyweight title will be like "facing Mount Everest".

headline: Fed Cup: Great Britain name unchanged team
text: Great Britain name a Fed Cup team of Johanna Konta, Heather Watson, Laura Robson and Jocelyn Rae for their tie against Romania.

headline: Juventus 3-0 Barcelona
text: Paulo Dybala scores twice as Juventus take charge of their Champions League quarter-final tie with Barcelona.

headline: Atletico Madrid v Leicester: How do Foxes win Champions League quarter-final?
text: Driven by the pain of two final defeats, Atletico Madrid are fearsome Champions League opponents for Leicester, writes Andy West.

headline: MCC confirms sendings-off and other laws to come in on 1 October
text: The MCC confirms that a series of law changes - including the introduction of sendings-off - will come into effect on 1 October.
